meanings.sent1: She enjoys queering her outfits with colorful accessories.
meanings.sent2: They are queering the art world with their unique perspective.
meanings.sent3: The cat is queering the room by knocking over all the plants.
meanings.sent4: His rebellious spirit is queering the status quo.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant graffiti queers the dull city walls.

meanings.definition: To challenge or disrupt traditional norms of gender and sexuality.
meanings.sent1: The activists are queering societal expectations through their advocacy work.
meanings.sent2: By queering gender roles, they are promoting inclusivity and diversity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy is queering the dog park by stealing everyone's toys.
meanings.sent4: Her bold fashion choices are queering the fashion industry.
meanings.sent5: The powerful speech queers the outdated beliefs of the audience.
